name: Symptom Checker
description: Helps identify possible conditions based on your current symptoms

name: Mental Health Check
description: Screens for anxiety, depression, and mood disorders

name: Medication Suggestions
description: AI-guided recommendations for over-the-counter options or doctor consultation

name: Personalized Diet Plan
description: Creates a nutrition plan based on your preferences, health goals, and restrictions

name: Weight Management Plan
description: Personalized strategies for healthy weight loss or gain

name: Cardiovascular Health Assessment
description: Evaluates heart health and cardiovascular risk factors

name: Sleep Health Analysis
description: Checks for insomnia, sleep apnea risk, and overall sleep quality

name: Diabetes Risk Assessment
description: Predictive assessment for Type 2 diabetes risk factors

name: Fitness Readiness Evaluation
description: Measures baseline fitness level for starting a workout program

name: Stress Management Assessment
description: Identifies stress levels and provides coping strategies
